Articles.Content:
THE HYPE PLANE HAS NO AIRBRAKES

Until 1.0 comes out, then we'll update the .craft file. ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

> 
> I'm gonna guess Danger Zone by Kenny Loggins...

<iframe width="459" height="344" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/siwpn14IE7E?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Listening now... Any other suggestions for when this ends?
Edit: Never mind.

I was gonna say something about my guess for the release time but thought better of it.

So much hype for new SSTOs.

> 
> People told me it was 200, then they changed it to 300. I don't know anything anymore.

.24 was 298
The HYPE is piling up. We need to go faster and Hype-r!
What time were the riddles released, again? I feel like the time is 45 minutes from now.
There are currently 2700 users online and increasing steadily. Let's try to break the record!
Moar hype needed we need to break the record!!! its only fitting
Ha ha ha, Youtube went straight from Danger Zone to Eye of the Tiger...

> 
> So if no major catastrophe or famous person dies today what are the odds of us getting the 1.0 launch to stay on [this](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/April_27) page for more than 2 minutes?

Look, can we **please** stop vandalizing Wikipedia?! I get it, your *Hype Containing Units*Ã¢â€žÂ¢ have a leak and are spilling hype all over, but that's no reason to treat the launch of KSP as the next best thing since the end of the Cold War...
Oh my god! I just finished the test, and holy crap! 246 pages!

> 
> What time were the riddles released, again? I feel like the time is 45 minutes from now.

Generally between 7 and 8 AM local for me, which is in about, um, 45 minutes.

> 
> What do Kerbals listen to in their spare time? I wanna psych myself up for the release...

Kerbal astronauts can only hear a constant ringing in their ears, due to the damage from countless screams and explosions.
It's happening, new posts with every f5 press...

> 
> Oh my god! I just finished the test, and holy crap! 246 pages!

Congrats on ya ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) Hope you did well.
Steam is showing me "updating 1 item" on bottom of the screen, but I am afraid to click and see if it is KSP or not.
Oooh! We should actually be able to replicate the real-life landspeed record now!!! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
Hype... yeayyy!

> 
> Steam is showing me "updating 1 item" on bottom of the screen, but I am afraid to click and see if it is KSP or not.

Nope, not KSP, its not doing anything for me.

> 
> Steam is showing me "updating 1 item" on bottom of the screen, but I am afraid to click and see if it is KSP or not.

It's not. Sorry!

> 
> Moar hype needed we need to break the record!!! its only fitting

To do that, we need to make 50 more pages to break it...

LET'S DO THIS!!

> 
> Look, can we **please** stop vandalizing Wikipedia?! I get it, your *Hype Containing Units*Ã¢â€žÂ¢ have a leak and are spilling hype all over, but that's no reason to treat the launch of KSP as the next best thing since the end of the Cold War...

COMMISSIONER! COMMISSIONER! The Hype Units are on fire and about to explode! \*explosion in the background, Jebidiah riding the shock wave all the way into orbit.\* Correction, the Hype is Exploding into Awesome.

\*looks around\* ...Where is it?...mumble \*checks every pocket\*

THERE IT IS!

MY HYPETRAIN TICKET!

EVERYONE ON BOARD?

(in before release ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif))
Oh come on! I fell asleep for a good eight hours and woke up and it's still not out.
